Html:
Is it possible to use QuickGraph to find the shortest path of a network lines from the shapefile (.shp)?

I googled and it NetTopology seems to be able to do this with QuickGraph.
But what about using some other shapefile binaries (like MapWinGIS and MapWindow)?

Can somebody provide a C# example of how Quick Graph can be use used to find the shortest path from the network of shapefile lines?

I would be grateful for any kind of reply.
